title: What is GPT-mark?
content: GPT-mark is a Chrome extension designed for the ChatGPT web interface. It provides a "Message Bookmark" feature and a "Sidebar Quick Navigation" function, allowing users to quickly mark and revisit important content.

title: How to add and manage bookmarks?
content:
A bookmark icon appears to the left of the copy button under each ChatGPT message. Click it to add or remove a bookmark.
Open the sidebar on the right to view your saved bookmarks. They can be sorted by conversation order or by the time they were added, and filtered using `#Hashtags`.

title: How to open the sidebar?
content:
• Click the extension icon.
• Right-click on the ChatGPT page and select "Open GPT-mark."

title: Can bookmarks be synced across devices?
content: Yes. The extension uses both `chrome.storage.local` and `chrome.storage.sync` to ensure bookmarks are synchronized across devices.

title: How to enable cross-device sync?
content: You must sign in to Chrome and enable the "Sync" feature (including extension data). Once enabled, bookmarks will automatically sync via `chrome.storage.sync` to all devices under the same account.

title: What if Chrome sync is not enabled?
content: If sync is disabled, the extension will still work offline. However, all bookmarks will only be stored locally in `chrome.storage.local` and will not sync to other devices automatically.

title: What format are bookmarks exported in?
content:
Bookmarks are exported as a JSON file:
• `downloadInfo`: Download timestamp and total number of conversations
• `chats`: Each conversation’s `chatId`, `url`, `bookmarkCount`, and `bookmarks`
  (including `id`, `role`, `content`, `hashtags`, `updatedAt`)

title: What is the double Enter feature?
content:
When editing a message:
• Single `Enter` → Line break
• Quick double `Enter` → Send message
• `Shift + Enter` → Always insert a line break

title: Is it normal that the sidebar doesn’t open on other websites?
content: Yes. The sidebar is only available on chat.openai.com and chatgpt.com to avoid interfering with unrelated websites.

title: Will my data be uploaded to any server?
content: No. The extension does not collect or send any data to the developer or third-party servers.
